name: Format\FloatDataFormat
description: The object that allows you to specify the number of digits after the decimal point for numeric values in data table cells.

properties.name: decimals
properties.description: The number of digits that can appear after the decimal point. The number will be rounded to this number of digits after the decimal.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of data format for this object. This must be float for a FloatDataFormat object.
